Address.label: Address
Address.value: 189 SECOND AVENUE,SUITE 2S, NEW YORK, New York, 10003, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Reading International Inc is a diversified company, engaged in the development, ownership, and operation of multiplex cinemas and retail and commercial real estate in the United States, Australia, and New Zealand. It operates through two segments: the Cinema segment includes Reading Cinemas, Angelika Film Center, Consolidated Theatres and City Cinemas; the Real Estate segment includes real estate development and the rental or licensing of retail, commercial and live theater assets.

value.name: Ellen Marie Cotter
value.title: Vice Chairman, President & Chief Executive Officer
